name: PassPhrase
0:
”Alexa, open Pass Phrase”
”Alexa, start Pass Phrase”
”Alexa, launch Pass Phrase”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pass phrase
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill can generate over five trillion possible pass phrases to help secure your online accounts.

Pass phrases are longer, stronger and easier to remember than passwords. Just a few random words plus a 3-digit number gives a strong password that's acceptable to most online services, and very hard to guess. No wonder security experts now recommend long phrases rather than short passwords.

On display devices you can see your pass phrases as well as hear them, and they're also sent to your Alexa app, so you'll have them in a safe place rather that writing them down.

How to use this skill

To start the skill, say 

Alexa, open Pass Phrase

To hear a new Pass Phrase, you can say

 Get me a pass phrase

To hear the last Pass Phrase again say

 Repeat 

To learn more about pass phrases, say

 What is a pass phrase

And for help with the skill, just say

 Help

To end the skill, say "Stop".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
